name: Kin
reason: One of the oldest app-currencies in crypto, migrated to Solana. Widely integrated into various apps and games. High decentralization due to long history and distribution.

name: DeFi Land
reason: Gamifies decentralized finance protocols into a farming simulation. Unique intersection of gaming and DeFi utility, with a moderate insider allocation for development.

name: Walken
reason: Move-to-earn lifestyle app connecting physical activity with gameplay. High insider score reflects the centralized nature of the app's economy management.

name: CaveWorld
reason: Utility token for the Crypto Cavemen ecosystem. Value is heavily tied to the success of their specific game loop, presenting higher volatility risks.

name: Green Satoshi Token
reason: The unlimited supply utility token for STEPN. Highly inflationary by design as a reward token, resulting in extreme volatility and depreciation pressure.

name: Tap Fantasy
reason: MMORPG on Solana. Standard play-to-earn economics apply. Moderate insider control, with value dependent on active player base retention.

name: Realy Metaverse
reason: Metaverse project focused on street culture and luxury. High insider score due to significant backing and concentrated control over the virtual world's development.

name: Space Falcon
reason: Intergalactic shooter game. The token economy is speculative, relying on future adoption of the game which is still in development phases.

name: Decimated
reason: Post-apocalyptic survival game. Token serves as the in-game currency. High tariff due to the long development cycle typical of high-fidelity blockchain games.

name: Yaku
reason: Community-driven metaverse hub. Lower insider score compared to larger studios, but carries standard speculative risks associated with metaverse projects.
